SOCNET: Messaging System Hub

We plan to provide an information hub for various partner's emergency messaging systems. You can click on "CONNECTIONS" in the menu above to see what platforms we plan to connect, or on "TECH SPECS" to get some (very general) details on how we plan to do that.

Our "minimal viable product" server exists at this location. We are also building a sample front-end app to illustrate how to use the API. Here you can learn more about SOCNET mission and activities.
